description: Police in Russia question a 38-year-old man over the killings along the Volga River.
title: 'Volga maniac' murders: Russia suspect arrested over deaths of 26 elderly women
title_page: 'Volga maniac' murders: Russia suspect arrested over deaths of 26 elderly women - BBC News
maintext: Mr Tagirov, who investigators say lives in the Russian city of Kazan, is alleged to have gained access to the homes of the victims by posing as a utility worker, before using objects such as dressing-gown cords and electricity cables to strangle them.
